title: Exposing rainforest carbon credits: why offsetting isn’t working
description: A Guardian investigation has found that more than 90% of the carbon offsets verified by the company Verra did not reduce deforestation. Patrick Greenfield reports. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: Exposing rainforest carbon credits: why offsetting isn’t working
creator: The Guardian
